name: Rekt of Towers
description:
Catapults are a very Ancient Technology. They are meant to destroy stuff. And destroying is FUN! Which Ancient Technology could be cooler?

Controls

  • WASD: Aim
  • Space: Confirm aim and launch
  • Q: Camera zoom
  • E: Map view
  • Click & drag: Orbit view

Credits

  • Art by: Lois Beitia @subproducto & Henry Lopez @rocky_lopez
  • Programming by: InigoVY & David Vidal @Txotxopue

Thanks to @Acrimiens and all the crew from Mechanical Boss and MadeInSpain for organizing the #GameBossJam event.
